news.header: New deal on abandoned oil refinery investment close to Launglon, Tanintharyi added

news.text:
Mong Tom Dam (Tasang Dam) Project
Hutgyi Hydropower Project
Shweli 3 Hydropower Project
Kunlong Dam (Upper Salween Dam)
Tanintharyi Hydropower Project

news.header: Oil palm deal in Tanintharyi added
news.text:
See deal details here.
Clcik here, to see the land conversion in a 30 year timelapse video.

news.header: Deal concerning suspended Myitsone Hydropower Project added
New deals in Sagaing Region added
news.text:
Two new land deals in Sagaing Region were added. Additional information concerning these deals are very welcome.
See the deal close to Homalin Township here.
See the second deal with a yet unspecified exact location here.

news.header: New Deals concerning Special Economic Zones added
news.text:
Deals concerning the Special Economic Zones (SEZ) in Dawei , Thilawa and Kyaukphyu were added.
Any further information as well as updates on these deals are most welcome.

news.header: New base layers are available now
news.text: Google Earth satellite images as well as ESRI World Imagery are available as base map now.

news.header: Mining areas added as context layer
news.text: Mining areas layer provided by Connette et al. 2016 is available as context layer now
The Global Forest Change Loss Layer for a period of time between 2001 and 2016 provided by Hansen et al. 2013 is available as context layer now.
A swipe function to modify transparency level of context layers was implemented.
